action: create a fresh new file - your blank canvas awaits!
open any file in your project in a flash
quickly open a file by typing its name! Pro tip: type > to access commands, # to search symbols across your project, or @ to jump to symbols in the current file
split your editor in half - work on two files side by side like a pro!
jump between tabs without touching your mouse
travel through your editing history - go back to files you just worked on
switch focus between split editors - try splitting your screen first with Cmd+\, then use this!
close the current tab in a snap
close ALL tabs at once - the nuclear option!
slide your editor group left or right
drag your current tab left or right without using the mouse
bring back a tab you just closed - it's like an undo button for tabs!
flip your editor layout from side-by-side to top-and-bottom (or vice versa)
preview your Markdown file side-by-side while you edit - perfect for README files!
see how your Markdown looks rendered - try it on a .md file!
spawn a brand new terminal - you can have multiple!
toggle the terminal on and off like magic
flip between your editor and terminal without touching your mouse
launch your code and watch it run! Press again to continue when paused
stop debugging and return to normal editing
set a breakpoint to pause your code at that line - click the line first!
step through your code one line at a time - see exactly what's happening!
jump up or down a whole screen at once - way faster than scrolling!
teleport your cursor to the start or end of the line instantly
grow your selection to include the whole word or line - keep pressing to expand more!
click anywhere to add another cursor - now you can type in multiple places at once!
select the next occurrence of the word under your cursor - keep pressing to select more!
select ALL occurrences of the current word at once - change them all together!
duplicate the current line up or down - no more copy-paste needed!
copy and paste an entire line without selecting it first - just put your cursor on the line!
cut the entire line without selecting it - your cursor just needs to be on that line!
delete the current line instantly - poof! It's gone!
delete entire words at a time instead of one character - so much faster!
comment or uncomment lines of code instantly - works in any language!
undo and redo your changes! You can go back and forth between them infinitely - it's like a time machine for your code!
move lines up or down without cutting and pasting - try it right now on this line!
insert a new line below without moving your cursor - try it in the middle of a line!
find any word in your file instantly - try searching for a common word!
add cursors above or below - type in multiple places at once like a wizard!
open the Command Palette and type 'auto save' - never lose your work again!
open the Command Palette and type 'color theme' - make VS Code look exactly how you want!
open the Command Palette and type 'format document' - instantly clean up messy code!
open the Command Palette and type 'toggle terminal' - show or hide the terminal instantly!
open the Command Palette and type 'file icon theme' - make your file icons look cool!
open the Command Palette and type 'reload window' - restart VS Code in one second!

shortcut: Cmd+F then type a repeated word in your file then Cmd+G / Cmd+Shift+G
action: find a word then jump between all matches with Cmd+G (next) and Cmd+Shift+G (previous) - try it now!
format your entire document to look perfect - works with any language!
see hints about function parameters while you type - super helpful when coding!
trigger autocomplete suggestions - let VS Code help you type faster!
open Settings to customize everything about VS Code - make it yours!
hide or show the file explorer sidebar - get more screen space when you need it!
view and customize ALL keyboard shortcuts - become a shortcut master!
open the Debug panel - run your code step-by-step to find bugs!
open the Explorer - see all your project files and folders!
search for text across your ENTIRE project - find anything anywhere!
open Source Control - see what files you've changed and commit them!
find and replace text across all files - change things everywhere at once!
see all errors and warnings in your code - fix them before they cause problems!
view output from extensions and tools - see what's happening behind the scenes!
browse and install extensions - add superpowers to VS Code!
copy the full path of your current file - useful for sharing or referencing!
copy the relative path of your file - shorter and cleaner than the full path!
toggle word wrap - make long lines fit on your screen without scrolling sideways!
jump to any line number instantly - type the line number and press Enter!
switch between VS Code and other apps instantly - works everywhere on Mac!
open a new VS Code window - work on multiple projects at once!
close the entire VS Code window - all tabs at once!
go full screen for maximum focus - no distractions!
